## GeometryDrawMode enum

Enum specifying how a geometry is drawn.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum GeometryDrawMode 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lineLoop | <code>2</code> | Draws a 1px line connecting all vertives and connects the last one back to the first. |
|  lines | <code>1</code> | Draws a 1px line connecting every two veritces. |
|  lineStrip | <code>3</code> | Draws a 1px line connecting all vertices. |
|  points | <code>0</code> | Draws a camera facing quad per vertex. |
|  triangleFan | <code>6</code> | Draws a [triangle fan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triangle_fan)<!-- -->. |
|  triangles | <code>4</code> | Draws a triangle for every three vertices. |
|  triangleStrip | <code>5</code> | Draws a [triangle strip](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triangle_strip)<!-- -->. |
